title: Satan's choice
creator_credit: Donald Shebib, Tom Daly and National Film Board of Canada
brief_description: A rare “inside” view of a motorcycle club in Toronto, one of the network of such fraternal groups in the large centres across North America. The names they adopt (Satan’s Choice is only one) are as individual as their special ethics and views of life, all freely expressed in this film.
